name: Cooking Star - Chef Master
description:
Cooking Star - an addictive time management cooking game! You can sharpen your skill as you prepare, cook, and serve delicious menu items in different restaurant. Join this game and become a real Cooking Star by practicing!

Special features that make Cooking Star addictive and fun:
Build your cooking city and start a new adventure.
Unlock your new restaurants & upgrade the kitchen to speed up cooking.
Cook plentiful food from different countries.
Serve the dishes in one time as quick as possible to play a combo for higher score.
Complete challenges and collect stars for unlocking new restaurant.
Beautiful graphics & lively sound effects.
More fun will be provided in next versions.

We hope Cooking Star can bring a lot of happiness to you! If you enjoy this game, please recommend this game to your family and friends! If you have any suggestion, 
please give us a feedback, we will make efforts to ameliorate the game based on comments from players.A fantastic cooking game is here for you!!
